author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
On MythBusters, did people use tools in ways for which they weren't intended? How does Adam Savage avoid doing too many things at once? Did MythBusters science data ever get saved? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members Wasteland Reaper, Dave Martin and Captain Greebly, whom we thank for their support. What's the weirdest rule you've ever had to follow at work?

00:00 Tool use
3:58 Plate spinning
9:35 MythBusters science data

Adam Savage Builds a Giant Book with @Nerdforge: https://youtu.be/U88Cl57KonU

title: Jamie and Adam's First Contract FORBADE This on MythBusters
